target_markets.market_description: Growing companies with 70-115+ employees facing coordination and communication problems
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Companies with 70+ employees experiencing scaling communication issues

target_markets.market_description: Men interested in health, longevity, and anti-aging
pain_points: maintaining youthful appearance professionally and personally
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Men's health interest at all-time high, longevity space becoming mainstream and cool

problems_validated.problem: Company coordination and communication breakdown as teams scale
problems_validated.severity: High - affects daily productivity and new hire onboarding
problems_validated.current_solutions: Company wikis on Notion, Slack searches, asking colleagues directly
problems_validated.market_gap: Notion pages are hard to navigate and find information, current solutions don't integrate all company communications

products_tools.name: Blockworks
products_tools.metrics: 70 employees, expecting 85-90 by year end, 6.5 years in operation

products_tools.name: Notion
products_tools.metrics: Pages often suck and are hard to navigate

products_tools.name: Slack
products_tools.metrics: Used for all internal messaging and coordination

business_strategies.strategy: Avoid taking venture capital in current market conditions
business_strategies.implementation: Focus on profitable, bootstrapped growth instead of VC funding
business_strategies.case_study: Referenced as a general market trend for 2024

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage deep domain expertise over just technical skills
business_strategies.implementation: Combine industry knowledge with easy-to-use SaaS and AI tools
business_strategies.expected_results: Competitive advantage in building relevant solutions
business_strategies.case_study: Contrasts 2008 when coding skills alone were sufficient advantage

problems_solutions.problem: Employees waste time asking menial questions about company information
problems_solutions.solution: AI-powered company chatbot that ingests all company communications
steps: Get founder and all employee opt-in
Integrate all communication channels (Slack, email, docs)

startup_ideas.idea: AI COO/Chief of Staff for companies
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Coordination and communication inefficiencies in scaling companies
startup_ideas.business_model: SaaS subscription for company-wide AI assistant
startup_ideas.validation: Test with companies experiencing scaling communication issues

startup_ideas.target_market: Health-conscious men interested in maintaining youthful appearance
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Men's growing interest in proactive health and appearance maintenance
startup_ideas.validation: Men's health interest at all-time high, mainstream adoption of longevity concepts

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not considering future competition when building AI tools
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Will compete against Google, Salesforce, Slack, Microsoft who can build similar features
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Think about what the business will be in 5 years and who you'll compete against
mistakes_to_avoid.example: AI COO idea will face competition from major tech companies

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Founders not thinking about long-term competitive landscape
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Building products that big tech can easily replicate and integrate
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Consider if successful, who will you be competing against in 5 years
mistakes_to_avoid.example: AI company tools can be built into existing platforms by Google/Microsoft

steps: Create AI database of all company communications
ai_workflows.use_case: Answer company questions, find documents, track project status, provide employee response time data
